name: Lethal Weapon
description:
Lethal Weapon is an action-arcade game developed by Eurocom and Ocean Software. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Ocean Software. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Lethal Weapon on Atari ST, Game Boy, NES and SNES.
Jeroen Godfried Tel and Neil Baldwin scored the game.
